name: Bienvenue chez moi
description: Rencontres privées à domicile qui favorisent un vivre ensemble basé sur l’accueil, la confiance et l’entraide.

name: Welcome to my place
description: Private meetings at home that promote a living together based on welcome, trust and mutual aid.

name: Mutual Aid

name: Mastopod
description: A Mastodon-compatible app that saves all data in your Pod.
